sql.where: 1=1 AND asset.asset_id = #{assetId} AND asset.asset_no = #{assetNo} AND asset.user_id = #{userId} AND asset.pdt_id = #{pdtId} AND asset.inst_id = #{instId} AND asset.order_id = #{orderId} AND asset.asset_contract_no = #{assetContract_no} AND asset.asset_amount = #{assetAmount} AND asset.asset_buymoney = #{assetBuymoney} AND asset.asset_yield = #{assetYield} AND asset.asset_yesterday_yield = #{assetYesterday_yield} AND asset.asset_yield_fee = #{assetYield_fee} AND asset.asset_charge = #{assetCharge} AND asset.asset_buy_count = #{assetBuy_count} AND asset.asset_price = #{assetPrice} AND asset.asset_yield_rate = #{assetYield_rate} AND asset.asset_buytime = #{assetBuytime} AND asset.asset_confirmtime = #{assetConfirmtime} AND asset.asset_start_yield_date = #{assetStart_yield_date} AND asset.asset_start_allot_yield_date = #{assetStart_allot_yield_date} AND asset.asset_expire_date = #{assetExpire_date} AND asset.asset_refund_date = #{assetRefund_date} AND asset.asset_expire_next_step = #{assetExpire_next_step} AND asset.asset_yield_updatetime = #{assetYield_updatetime} AND asset.asset_repaytime = #{assetRepaytime} AND asset.asset_collect_no = #{assetCollect_no} AND asset.asset_pay_no = #{assetPay_no} AND asset.asset_status = #{assetStatus} AND asset.asset_createtime = #{assetCreatetime} AND asset.asset_modifytime = #{assetModifytime}

1=1 AND asset_id = #{assetId} AND asset_no = #{assetNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND pdt_id = #{pdtId} AND inst_id = #{instId} AND order_id = #{orderId} AND asset_contract_no = #{assetContract_no} AND asset_amount = #{assetAmount} AND asset_buymoney = #{assetBuymoney} AND asset_yield = #{assetYield} AND asset_yesterday_yield = #{assetYesterday_yield} AND asset_yield_fee = #{assetYield_fee} AND asset_charge = #{assetCharge} AND asset_buy_count = #{assetBuy_count} AND asset_price = #{assetPrice} AND asset_yield_rate = #{assetYield_rate} AND asset_buytime = #{assetBuytime} AND asset_confirmtime = #{assetConfirmtime} AND asset_start_yield_date = #{assetStart_yield_date} AND asset_start_allot_yield_date = #{assetStart_allot_yield_date} AND asset_expire_date = #{assetExpire_date} AND asset_refund_date = #{assetRefund_date} AND asset_expire_next_step = #{assetExpire_next_step} AND asset_yield_updatetime = #{assetYield_updatetime} AND asset_repaytime = #{assetRepaytime} AND asset_collect_no = #{assetCollect_no} AND asset_pay_no = #{assetPay_no} AND asset_status = #{assetStatus} AND asset_createtime = #{assetCreatetime} AND asset_modifytime = #{assetModifytime}

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS count FROM dr_asset AS asset

SELECT asset.asset_id as assetId, asset.asset_no as assetNo, asset.user_id as userId, asset.pdt_id as pdtId, asset.inst_id as instId, asset.order_id as orderId, asset.asset_contract_no as assetContract_no, asset.asset_amount as assetAmount, asset.asset_buymoney as assetBuymoney, asset.asset_yield as assetYield, asset.asset_yesterday_yield as assetYesterday_yield, asset.asset_yield_fee as assetYield_fee, asset.asset_charge as assetCharge, asset.asset_buy_count as assetBuy_count, asset.asset_price as assetPrice, asset.asset_yield_rate as assetYield_rate, asset.asset_buytime as assetBuytime, asset.asset_confirmtime as assetConfirmtime, asset.asset_start_yield_date as assetStart_yield_date, asset.asset_start_allot_yield_date as assetStart_allot_yield_date, asset.asset_expire_date as assetExpire_date, asset.asset_refund_date as assetRefund_date, asset.asset_expire_next_step as assetExpire_next_step, asset.asset_yield_updatetime as assetYield_updatetime, asset.asset_repaytime as assetRepaytime, asset.asset_collect_no as assetCollect_no, asset.asset_pay_no as assetPay_no, asset.asset_status as assetStatus, asset.asset_createtime as assetCreatetime, asset.asset_modifytime as assetModifytime FROM dr_asset AS asset WHERE asset_id = #{assetId}

SELECT asset.asset_id as assetId, asset.asset_no as assetNo, asset.user_id as userId, asset.pdt_id as pdtId, asset.inst_id as instId, asset.order_id as orderId, asset.asset_contract_no as assetContract_no, asset.asset_amount as assetAmount, asset.asset_buymoney as assetBuymoney, asset.asset_yield as assetYield, asset.asset_yesterday_yield as assetYesterday_yield, asset.asset_yield_fee as assetYield_fee, asset.asset_charge as assetCharge, asset.asset_buy_count as assetBuy_count, asset.asset_price as assetPrice, asset.asset_yield_rate as assetYield_rate, asset.asset_buytime as assetBuytime, asset.asset_confirmtime as assetConfirmtime, asset.asset_start_yield_date as assetStart_yield_date, asset.asset_start_allot_yield_date as assetStart_allot_yield_date, asset.asset_expire_date as assetExpire_date, asset.asset_refund_date as assetRefund_date, asset.asset_expire_next_step as assetExpire_next_step, asset.asset_yield_updatetime as assetYield_updatetime, asset.asset_repaytime as assetRepaytime, asset.asset_collect_no as assetCollect_no, asset.asset_pay_no as assetPay_no, asset.asset_status as assetStatus, asset.asset_createtime as assetCreatetime, asset.asset_modifytime as assetModifytime FROM dr_asset AS asset
${orderby}
